SET ARQUIVO_JOGADORES TO SET ARQUIVO_KITS TO '000;Kit Basico;Nada de especial;0000000000.00;######################################################001;RBD;Ao morrer, permite voltar 10s antes de sua morte;0000003899.00;#############################002;Kangoroo;Foguete que permite salto duplo;0000001487.00;#########################################';

INSERT INTO partidas VALUES ('202410080432','001622','0001', '728395623018392049123424307783145812345678919123084231193804621236510046219559100462199957653993524728495612346739203456791230562845', '000000000002000000000000000000000002', '001622001621001530001451001236001010000944000912000740000513000427000312', '000200010001000100010001000100000000000000000002');
INSERT INTO partidas VALUES ('202409271721','001955','0001', '839204912345765399352491230562845728395623012430778314591230842311812345678919380462123651004621955910046219997284956123467392034567', '001000000000002000000000002000000000', '001955001954001731001612001224001101001032001023001021000913000912000553', '000500020001000000010001000000000000000000000000');
SELECT * FROM kits WHERE preco <= ('SELECT saldo FROM jogadores WHERE id_jogador = '59932519774');
RECOMPENSAR_VENCEDORES('202409010000', '202409302359', 3000);
RECOMPENSAR_VENCEDORES('202410010000', '202410312359', 4000);
RECOMPENSAR_VENCEDORES('202411010000', '202411302359', 5000);
SELECT * FROM kits WHERE preco <= ('SELECT saldo FROM jogadores WHERE id_jogador = '59932519774');
SELECT * FROM partidas WHERE inicio BETWEEN '202410080432' AND '202411182130' ORDER BY inicio ASC;
\echo file ARQUIVO_JOGADORES
\echo file ARQUIVO_PARTIDAS
\echo file ARQUIVO_RESULTADOS
\echo index data_partida_idx
\q
